trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_SEQ_00<tab>Cahciua would guide you to the next zone.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Asyle Volcane guard.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Cahciua.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_KRILE_000_001<tab>And that makes half...
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_GRAHATIA_000_002<tab>Upon our return, we must regale Gulool Ja with the heroic tale of Ser Otis Velona.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_ERENVILLE_000_003<tab>...Two zones to go.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_004<tab>We still have a ways to go. Let's keep moving.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_010<tab>So far there appears to be no change with the Meso Terminal.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_011<tab>So let's take the opportunity to visit another zone: Asyle Volcane, in the northeast.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_012<tab>The place with the volcano, eh? And I suppose we're using the zip line again.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_013<tab>You know it. Like before, I'll take care of the guard at the Gate of Remembrance. Come, let's head back.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_KRILE_000_014<tab>That's a fiery place indeed... I wonder what it's themed upon.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_GRAHATIA_000_015<tab>I must say, it saddens me to see the scenery change in our wake.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_ERENVILLE_000_016<tab>How can she be so carefree about everything...?
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_017<tab>That volcano <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> isn't real, right? All that smoke pouring out is just part of the glamour?
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_ASYLEVOLCANEGUARD_000_018<tab><bleep> <bloop> Error. Error. Download...complete. User registration...c-c-confirmed.

TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_ASYLEVOLCANEGUARD_000_019<tab>Dauntless adventurers, I bid you welcome to Asyle Volcane, the sanctuary of the strong! Fight with courage and honor, that your legend may resound forevermore in the Arena of Valor!
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab><gulp> It's only an illusion... It's only an illusion...
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_100_020<tab>What's this, now? Don't tell me you're afraid of the lava?
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_110_020<tab>N-Not on your life! I-It isn't even real, is it?
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_021<tab>Oh, definitely not. But don't take my word for it─jump in and see for yourself.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>N-No need. I-I believe you.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_023<tab>That there is the terminal.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_100_023<tab>You can get to it via the caverns that run through the volcano.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_024<tab>I'll go on ahead and wait for you. Take care around the wildlife, now!
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>Hey, Erenville?
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_ERENVILLE_000_026<tab>I'll explore alone. You needn't worry─I'll give the wildlife a wide berth.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_KRILE_000_027<tab>Poor Erenville... He's still coming to terms with it.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_028<tab>You can hardly blame him. Let's leave him be for now.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_029<tab>Come on, let's get moving ourselves.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_KRILE_000_055<tab>Right would seem to be the more direct path to the terminal, but I must say I'm curious about that building on the left.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_GRAHATIA_000_060<tab>The mechanical soldiers are as common here as they are in Solution Nine. I wonder how long ago they were created.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>Looks like we have two paths to choose from. I thought I saw Cahciua heading left, though.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_KRILE_000_071<tab>While that would seem to be a detour, I must say I'm rather curious about that round building.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_072<tab>Well, I'm always up for the scenic route. Let's follow after Cahciua and see what the building's about!
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_KRILE_000_075<tab>Found her!
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_GRAHATIA_000_080<tab>A round building with seating for spectators... Might this be a fighting arena?
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_085<tab>Erenville is...elsewhere, of course.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_090<tab>Well now, look who came this way too. Great minds, as they say!
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_GRAHATIA_000_091<tab>This appears to be a fighting arena. Is it also a recreation of an actual place?
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_092<tab>In all likelihood. While I don't know the details, I understand such facilities were once common across the land.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_093<tab>Though it's closed at the moment, even Solution Nine has the Arcadion. It may well be a legacy of the past.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_CAHCIUA_000_094<tab>Anyway, it seems the next match is about to begin. As I've already spectated my fill, I will move on, but you ought to head inside for a look!
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_GRAHATIA_000_095<tab>To think that Krile would actually meet her parents...
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_WUKLAMAT_000_100<tab>Miracles really do happen here... I'm happy for Krile.
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_KRILE_000_110<tab>Could it be that the system orchestrated this reunion as well...?
TEXT_KINGMF108_04953_KRILE_000_111<tab>Forgive me... This is all so much to take in, I'm struggling to collect my thoughts.
